slides.title: Lighthouse Audits
slides.content:
# Lighthouse Audits ðŸ 

Built into Chrome DevTools.

## Categories:
- Performance (0-100)
- Accessibility (0-100)
- Best Practices (0-100)
- SEO (0-100)
- PWA

## Running Lighthouse:
1. Open DevTools (F12)
2. Go to Lighthouse tab
3. Select categories
4. Click Analyze

## CLI Usage:
```bash
npm install -g lighthouse
lighthouse https://example.com --output html
```

## Score Targets:
| Score | Rating |
|-------|--------|
| 90-100 | Good |
| 50-89 | Needs Improvement |
| 0-49 | Poor |

slides.title: axe DevTools
slides.content:
# axe DevTools ðŸª“

Professional accessibility testing.

## Features:
- Browser extension
- Detailed issue reports
- Code snippets
- WCAG references
- Intelligent analysis

## Usage:
1. Install axe DevTools extension
2. Open DevTools
3. Go to axe tab
4. Click Analyze

## Report Details:
- Issue description
- Impact level
- Element location
- How to fix
- WCAG criteria

## Integration:
```javascript
// axe-core for testing
const axe = require('axe-core');

axe.run(document, (err, results) => {
    console.log(results.violations);
});
```

slides.title: Screen Reader Testing
slides.content:
# Screen Reader Testing ðŸ”Š

Manual testing with assistive tech.

## Popular Screen Readers:
| Name | Platform | Cost |
|------|----------|------|
| NVDA | Windows | Free |
| JAWS | Windows | Paid |
| VoiceOver | Mac/iOS | Built-in |
| TalkBack | Android | Built-in |

## Testing Checklist:
- [ ] All images have alt text
- [ ] Forms have labels
- [ ] Headings are logical
- [ ] Links are descriptive
- [ ] Focus order is correct

## VoiceOver Basics (Mac):
- Cmd+F5 to toggle
- Ctrl+Option+arrows to navigate
- Ctrl+Option+Space to activate

slides.title: Reporting
slides.content:
# Audit Reporting ðŸ“Š

## Report Structure:
1. **Executive Summary**
   - Overall scores
   - Critical issues
   - Priority fixes

2. **Detailed Findings**
   - Issue description
   - Impact/Severity
   - Location
   - How to fix

3. **Recommendations**
   - Quick wins
   - Long-term improvements
   - Resources

## Severity Levels:
| Level | Priority |
|-------|----------|
| Critical | Fix immediately |
| Major | Fix this sprint |
| Minor | Schedule fix |
| Enhancement | Future improvement |
